root.name: Tap Tap Revenge: Tour
root.description: While the main goal of the game remains the same, there are some new features that are introduced.New FeaturesSwipe Notes- Some notes in a song now have to be swiped in an upwards direction, kind of like Fruit Ninja.Shake BarsTour Mode- Every day a new venue in the tour is unlocked and you can play a supporting, opening, and headline song. (With the possibility of two encore songs if you do well enough .)
